features: [Double Bluetooth Connection] Connect the wireless mouse by bluetooth 3.0 or 5.0, you will get longer working distance, more stable connection and power saving.Never worry your mouse not working when you lose the usb receiver.The bluetooth mouse will offer more convinent in your desk-life.

[Modernize Ergonomic Design] 30° natural handshake angle,the sides profile and stylish matte surface as a advance ergonomic design provide more comfort,less muscle strain and stress.Anti-slip massage grips will prevent the ergonomic mouse slide from your hand.

[Faster Moving,Less Consume]5 adjustable DPI(800-1600),cordless mouse provide highly-prcesion tracking and easy controling,help you reduce up-body movent and bring comfort.You can cross between gaming and working freely by 5 level DPI.

[SSSSSSupper Battery-life]You just need 1 AA Battery,it will active instantly and keep working up to 18 months.Never worry the laptop mouse work out suddently at short time and help you slove the problem of costing more in battery replacement

[4+2 Convenience Buttons]There are 6 buttons in this computer mouse,2 of them are forward and backward button.The convenience buttons will boost your work-efficiency and save your operation step,such as email,web browsing and so on.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 8,960 ratings 4.5 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressed with this mouse
reviews.reviewText: Bought this mouse on April 22' and I use it every day for work and entertainment (not gaming). Overall it kept its promise about the battery, this was my first concern when choosing for a mouse with long battery life. Battery has lasted for about a year (and counting). I don't know if it will make it to 16 months, but for me 11 good months are a fair enough.The clic is not silent but also not loud, the normal level for working without being annoyed by the sound. I also liked the ergonomic design. I've never used a mouse with buttons for back and forward but know they are essential for me. The DPI adjustment is also very nice, it has three levels and it's very easy to get used to it.In the photo the logo is quite erased due to daily use, but overall this is a very nice mouse to buy.EDIT: July 2023 - After 15 months the scrolling wheel started failing when navigating. Not changing my opinion about the mouse, I will purchase another one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great mouse!
reviews.reviewText: This is by far the best mouse I have ever purchased. The battery life is great, the mouse is easy to store and take with you, and overall operates great. Totally recommend to anyone, whether its gaming, office work or something else. Great buy, great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Connected with no problems. Use it everyday. Satisfied with the performance. Good bang for the buck. Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good inexpenive mouse with some caveats
reviews.reviewText: Likes: - Comfortable in the hand- Feels solid without being too heavy- DPI button is a nice touch and doesn't get in the way (accidental clicks, etc...)Dislikes: - Sleep function on this mouse happens way too fast.- Scrolling is not good. Quick moves tend to scroll up and down simultaneously making the screen go nowhere.Overview:I like this mouse but unfortuntely the reviews are accurate. The sleep function is maddening to say the least. Type a little too long and you'll find yourself wiggling to mouse all over wondering where the pointer is. Click a mouse button and suddenly it appears. I would have dragged that timer out for at least another minute or two or make it so it woke up on movement as well as click. Unfortunately, there is nothing you can do about this.Scrolling doesn't work very well either. There are a few things you can do to help remedy this situation which helps immensely:1. Go into windows settings and change the number of lines to scroll at a time. It defaults at 3, I changed it to 1 and it was really smooth, but too slow for my liking. I went to 4 and that seemed to be good.2. Click down on the wheel (For those that may not know, your wheel is a 3rd button) and you will see a small circle with two arrows appear. move it up and down to scroll smoothly. The more off the click point you go the faster it will scroll.If you are willing to live with those two things it is a great mouse. If not, you'd be better served with something else. I had a hard time deciding between 3 and 4 stars. I went with 4 because for me, it works well and I'm okay with the workarounds. They lost that 5th star because the sleep mode could likely be resolved with a simple software update. For the money though, it's a tough mouse to beat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm an average, every day computer user and this mouse is perfect for me. Very comfortable in my hand, and no problems with the cursor. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: nice small dongle. Performs well. Good price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best I have ever used - Love It!
reviews.reviewText: This is a fabulous mouse. very responsive, can adjust mouse settings and the track wheel is a super bonus - I use it all the time - forgot how nice a track wheel is in today’s ever scrolling world. The touchpad buttons on my PC were getting worn out so I purchased this Bluetooth mouse and I just love it! not sure if I will ever use a touchpad again. Also it connects to the Bluetooth very quickly. I am actually thinking of purchasing another one just so I have it if this one ever wears out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Have trouble with mouse wheel on several models
reviews.reviewText: I've purchased several of these over the years. Overall, they've been great, but now I've had a least two that I've noticed the mouse wheel not working on. It works, but will intermittently go the wrong direction and is very frustrating, so I'm now ready to pay a little more for something else for better quality.
